charaepi_ch0111_00_wataru/2301_1101_0100:
One day, as [Name:PlayerNickname ] was
walking around the crowded streets of Pasio,
[EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] ran into a familiar face.
charaepi_ch0111_00_wataru/2301_1201_0300: Fancy running into you in this hustle and bustle!
charaepi_ch0111_00_wataru/2301_1201_0400:
With so many people around, Dragonite might just
want to take to the skies.
charaepi_ch0111_00_wataru/2301_0402_0800:
Yeah, he has an endearing face, doesn’t he?
But don’t let that baby face fool you! He’s really
strong when it counts!
charaepi_ch0111_00_wataru/2301_1201_0900:
He’s got a heart of gold, though. Whenever he
sees people or Pokémon in need, he helps them
without a second thought.
charaepi_ch0111_00_wataru/2301_1201_1000:
But on the other hand, he doesn’t pull any punches
against wrongdoers!
charaepi_ch0111_00_wataru/2301_1201_1100:
See, I think it’s important that Pokémon and people
are able to spend their days in peace no matter
the time or place.
charaepi_ch0111_00_wataru/2301_1201_1200:
And if there’s anybody who threatens that peace,
I intend to be right there to protect it along
with Dragonite!
charaepi_ch0111_00_wataru/2301_1201_1300: Aaah! Thief! Give me back my Poké Ball!
charaepi_ch0111_00_wataru/2301_1201_1500: Heh! Try catching me in this crowd, loser!
charaepi_ch0111_00_wataru/2301_1201_1600:
Speak of the devil... [Name:PlayerNickname ],
could I ask you for your help?
charaepi_ch0111_00_wataru/2301_1201_1900: Aaugh! No! Please don’t hurt me!
charaepi_ch0111_00_wataru/2301_1201_2000:
You thought you could get away with stealing
in front of me?!
charaepi_ch0111_00_wataru/2301_1201_2200:
No need for thanks.
I’m just glad that you’re all right.
Here’s your Poké Ball back.
charaepi_ch0111_00_wataru/2301_1201_2300:
No, you really helped me back there!
Thank you so much!
charaepi_ch0111_00_wataru/2301_1201_2400: Well, I couldn’t abandon somebody in need.
charaepi_ch0111_00_wataru/2301_1201_2500: I’m sure Dragonite felt the same way.
charaepi_ch0111_00_wataru/2301_1201_2600:
Also, it might be a little meddlesome of us, but
wanting to help future Trainers is in our nature.
charaepi_ch0111_00_wataru/2301_1201_2700:
I know from that battle earlier that you have
quite a lot of potential.
charaepi_ch0111_00_wataru/2301_1201_2800:
I look forward to battling alongside you more in
the future!
